dct_title_s: Kaei kaisei shinsen Kyō ezu gazu genkō Morikawa Yasuyuki.
dct_description_sm: Mounted cover title. Wood block print. Oriented with north to the left. In Japanese. Relief shown pictorially. Includes legend. Proofread by Haga Shunsui. 1 map: col.; 48 x 67 cm.,folded in cover 18 x 12 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
